location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire, to William Newnham, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledges William Newnham's letter of 27 February 1813, which reported that the Port of Malvan had been ceded to the East India Company. William Bruce states that he has informed the mercantile community of this development.
